Tensor flow. - Familiarity with database technology such as MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB. Testing Tools: - Appium, Selenium, Robotium, Mockito. Our DeepTech Startup was founded on the core R and D which our serial Digital Health Startup Entrepreneur, StartupGuru, and Founder and CEO and Benovymed Chief Global R and D | AI Health Innovation Officer | Chief Business Strategy Officer I Chief Digital Health Officer has developed in over his strong over 28 Years Health Technology experience of Science and Technology driven by ( Digital Health, AI Health, Telemedicine, Big Data, Blockchain, and IoT ) Disruption and Innovation will replace many Big Players Globally from the Market in no time "Just like Smart Phone company demonetized / Replaced the entire Button Phone Companies, Big giants, globally". 8) CTC : - This is a high-growth career opportunity that is only best for those who have the capability to fast grow the organization as a High growth driver and with an Entrepreneur Mindset.
